((HasQuest("Fire and Venom")) and (not IsQuestObjectiveCompleted("Fire and Venom", 2)))

((HasQuest("The Light of Jebiah")) and (not IsQuestObjectiveCompleted("The Light of Jebiah", 1)))

Python.Statement: GigaRift.Chat.ExecuteCommand("equip Leg Guards of the Inquisitorial Flame")
GigaRift.Chat.ExecuteCommand("equip Greaves of the Wolf Slayer")
